title: Web-Based Active Learning Design for Engineering Self-Regulated Learning Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic control engineering theory and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Web-enhanced active learning design applying self-regulated learning strategies in smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies (self-assessment, goal setting, time management) to engineering problem-solving with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can design a personalized learning roadmap on a web-based platform within four weeks and revise/improve it at least twice.
Learners can write a self-reflection report categorizing learning outcomes into at least three levels based on peer feedback and formative assessment results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
